    AddTree(<mitoTracing>)

    Add_Tree Optional, if a phylogentic tree object phylo is already available, can be directly added to the mitoTracing class in slot TREE

    Make_matrix(<mitoTracing>)

    Make_matrix This will make the matixies of Cell VS mitochondrial variants and return mitoTracing Results stored in Cts.Mtx and Cts.Mtx.bi

    Make_matrix()

    Make_matrix This will make the matixies of Cell VS mitochondrial variants and return mitoTracing Results stored in Cts.Mtx and Cts.Mtx.bi

    Make_tree(<mitoTracing>)

    Make_tree This will generate a basic phylogenetic tree

    Make_tree This will generate a basic phylogenetic tree

    MutationProfile.bulk()

    Function to plot bulk level mutation signatures

    SeuratLSIClustering(<mitoTracing>)

    SeuratLSIClustering This will use the mito variants for Seurat clustering (LSI based)

    SeuratLSIClustering This will use the mito variants for Seurat clustering (LSI based)

    An intermediate S4 class Tree that store tree info

    mitoTracing-class

    Major mitoTracing class that store clonal-resolved multi-omics
